  • Created: September 29, 2014

PublicSpot
A Spot is a great tool for real-time online communication. The PublicSpot is the main area of the Spot, where users gather to talk with each other openly.Â Everything a user writes in the PublicSpot is seen by all other users of that Spot and by site visitors that have yet to join the Spot.
